casebody.data:
WASCO LLC
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT & NATURAL RESOURCES 164P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 David Guidry, Attorney at Law, Adam G. Sowatzka, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, Cory Hohnbaum, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for WASCO LLC. Daniel Hirschman, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Environment And Natural Resources, Division of Waste Management.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of August 2017 by Petitioner for Withdrawal and Substitution of Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
